CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL(Case_object__r.Case_Priority__c ,'Priority 1 – AOG/Urgent/Critical: Closure < 24 hours')&&((((Case_object__r.Time_Email_Sent__c - Case_object__r.CreatedDate )*24)<=24)||(((Case_object__r.ClosedDate - Case_object__r.CreatedDate )*24)<=24))), 1, if(((ISPICKVAL(Case_object__r.Case_Priority__c ,'Priority 2 – Priority- Customer Requirement: Closure < 48 hours') && ((((Case_object__r.Time_Email_Sent__c - Case_object__r.CreatedDate )*24)<=48) || (((Case_object__r.ClosedDate - Case_object__r.CreatedDate )*24)<=48)))),1,if((ISPICKVAL(Case_object__r.Case_Priority__c ,'Priority 3 – Standard: Closure < 7 days') && ((((Case_object__r.Time_Email_Sent__c - Case_object__r.CreatedDate )*24)<=168) || (((Case_object__r.ClosedDate - Case_object__r.CreatedDate )*24)<=168))),1,if((ISPICKVAL(Case_object__r.Case_Priority__c ,'Priority 4 – Complex: Closure: 1 week to 30 days') && ((((Case_object__r.Time_Email_Sent__c - Case_object__r.CreatedDate )*24)<=720) || ((Case_object__r.ClosedDate - Case_object__r.CreatedDate )*24)<=720)),1,0))))
CustomField.label: First Contact Response
